languages.text: "{name} прав{mf||а}, не так ли?" {n}Маражай переводит взгляд на Караэля.{/n} "Долго ли ты себя убеждал, что отдавать соратников на поживу дряхлеющей развалине — путь к спасению, м? Надеялся купить милосердие, снизойдя до статуса игрушки боли? Трусость и лизоблюдство — твои новые имена, гонец Опустошительной бури!"

"{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"
languages.original_text: "{name} прав{mf||а}, не так ли?" {n}Маражай переводит взгляд на Караэля.{/n} "Долго ли ты себя убеждал, что отдавать соратников на поживу дряхлеющей развалине — путь к спасению, м? Надеялся купить милосердие, снизойдя до статуса игрушки боли? Трусость и лизоблюдство — твои новые имена, гонец Опустошительной бури!"

Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

"{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

languages.text: "{name} hat doch recht, oder nicht?" {n}Marazhai blickt zu Kharael.{/n} "Wie lange schon versucht Ihr Euch einzureden, dass Ihr nur überleben könnt, indem Ihr Eure Waffenbrüder diesem altersschwachen Wrack übergebt, hm? Ihr wollt Euch Gnade erkaufen, indem Ihr Euch selbst zu einem bloßen Spielzeug degradiert? Feigheit und Speichelleckerei sind Eure neuen Namen, Gesandter des plündernden Sturms!"
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} hat doch recht, oder nicht? {n}Marazhai blickt zu Kharael.{/n} "Wie lange schon versucht Ihr Euch einzureden, dass Ihr nur überleben könnt, indem Ihr Eure Waffenbrüder diesem altersschwachen Wrack übergebt, hm? Ihr wollt Euch Gnade erkaufen, indem Ihr Euch selbst zu einem bloßen Spielzeug degradiert? Feigheit und Speichelleckerei sind Eure neuen Namen, Gesandter des plündernden Sturms!"

languages.text: “{name}没说错吧？”{n}玛拉斋将目光转向了卡瑞尔。{/n}“你花了多长时间才说服自己，认为只有把你的兄弟们交给这个可怜虫，才能想办法活下去？嗯？你就这么希望让自己沦为玩物，来换取别人的宽恕吗？狂风阴谋团的特使啊，你不过是个懦夫，是个马屁精！”
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}没说错吧？”{n}玛拉斋将目光转向了卡瑞尔。{/n}“你花了多长时间才说服自己，认为只有把你的兄弟们交给这个可怜虫，才能想办法活下去？嗯？你就这么希望让自己沦为玩物，来换取别人的宽恕吗？狂风阴谋团的特使啊，你不过是个懦夫，是个马屁精！”

languages.text: « {name} a raison, n'est-ce pas ? {n}Marazhai tourne le regard vers Kharael.{/n} Depuis combien de temps essayez-vous de vous convaincre qu'abandonner vos frères d'armes à cette épave décrépie est la seule solution pour survivre ? Vous espérerez inspirer la miséricorde en devenant esclave ? Vous n'êtes que lâcheté et flagornerie, émissaire de la Tempête ravageuse ! »
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: « {name} a raison, n'est-ce pas ? {n}Marazhai tourne le regard vers Kharael.{/n} Depuis combien de temps essayez-vous de vous convaincre qu'abandonner vos frères d'armes à cette épave décrépie est la seule solution pour survivre ? Vous espérerez inspirer la miséricorde en devenant esclave ? Vous n'êtes que lâcheté et flagornerie, émissaire de la Tempête ravageuse ! »

languages.text: «{name} tiene razón, ¿me equivoco?». {n}Marazhai dirige su mirada a Kharael.{/n} «¿Desde cuándo llevas convenciéndote de que el único modo de sobrevivir es entregando a tus hermanos de armas a este desastre decrépito? ¿Pretendes comprar clemencia poniéndote a la misma altura que un mero juguete? ¡Deberías pasar a llamarte Cobardía o Servilismo, enviado de la Tempestad Asoladora!».
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: «{name} tiene razón, ¿me equivoco?». {n}Marazhai dirige su mirada a Kharael.{/n} «¿Desde cuándo llevas convenciéndote de que el único modo de sobrevivir es entregando a tus hermanos de armas a este desastre decrépito? ¿Pretendes comprar clemencia poniéndote a la misma altura que un mero juguete? ¡Deberías pasar a llamarte Cobardía o Servilismo, enviado de la Tempestad Asoladora!».

languages.text: "{name}は正しい、そうだろう？"{n}マラズハイは視線をカラエルに移す。{/n}「お前の戦友たちをこのオンボロ船に渡すことが生き残る唯一の手段だと、どのくらい自分に言い聞かせてきたんだ？自分自身を単なるおもちゃと貶めて、同情を買おうとしているのか？臆病と卑劣がお前の新しい名だ、リーヴィング・テンペストの使者よ！」
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: "{name}は正しい、そうだろう？"{n}マラズハイは視線をカラエルに移す。{/n}「お前の戦友たちをこのオンボロ船に渡すことが生き残る唯一の手段だと、どのくらい自分に言い聞かせてきたんだ？自分自身を単なるおもちゃと貶めて、同情を買おうとしているのか？臆病と卑劣がお前の新しい名だ、リーヴィング・テンペストの使者よ！」

languages.text: "{name} haklı, değil mi?" {n}Marazhai bakışlarını Kharael'e kaydırıyor.{/n} "Silah arkadaşlarını bu çökmüş döküntüye teslim etmenin tek hayatta kalma yolu olduğu konusunda kendini ne kadar zamandır kandırıyorsun? Kendini bir oyuncak olarak sununca merhamet göreceğini mi sandın? Müfteris Kasırga'nın elçisi, senin yeni isimlerin bundan böyle ödleklik ve dalkavukluktur!"
languages.original_text: "{name} is right, is {mf|he|she} not?" {n}Marazhai shifts his gaze to Kharael.{/n} "How long have you been trying to convince yourself that handing over your brothers-in-arms to this decrepit wreck is the only way to survive, hmm? Hoping to buy mercy by degrading yourself to a mere plaything? Cowardice and sycophancy are your new names, envoy of the Reaving Tempest!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} haklı, değil mi?" {n}Marazhai bakışlarını Kharael'e kaydırıyor.{/n} "Silah arkadaşlarını bu çökmüş döküntüye teslim etmenin tek hayatta kalma yolu olduğu konusunda kendini ne kadar zamandır kandırıyorsun? Kendini bir oyuncak olarak sununca merhamet göreceğini mi sandın? Müfteris Kasırga'nın elçisi, senin yeni isimlerin bundan böyle ödleklik ve dalkavukluktur!"
